column3: Question
My thoughts were related to:
column5: The here and now                            A more distant time

column3: My thoughts were hard for me to stop
My thoughts were on topics that I care about
My thoughts were about ideas rather than events or objects
My thoughts were intrusive.
I was thinking about an event that has happened or could take place
I was thinking about solutions to problems (or goals).
My thoughts at different points in time were all on the same theme
My thoughts dragged my attention away from the external world
My thoughts gave me a new insight into something I have thought about before
My thoughts involved future events.
My thoughts involved past events.
My thoughts involved myself.
My thoughts involved other people.
The content of my thoughts was:
My thoughts were in the form of images.
My thoughts were in the form of words.
My thoughts were vivid as if I was there
My thoughts were detailed and specific.
This thought has recurrent themes similar to those I have had before.
My thoughts tended to evolve in a series of steps
My thoughts were:
My thoughts were focused on the task I was performing.
